word: go by bicycle, bus, car, plane, taxi, train
meaning: đi bằng xe đạp, xe buýt, xe hơi, máy bay, taxi, xe lửa

word: take/catch/get a bus, take a train, take a plane
meaning: đi / bắt / đi xe buýt, đi tàu, đi máy bay

word: get a taxi / take a taxi
get on a bus, get on a train / get off a bus, get off a train
meaning: lên xe buýt, lên tàu / xuống xe buýt, xuống tàu
